title: Core Schema Definitions
description: Core definitions that are used to compose the Linked Art JSON-LD API

labelProp.title: rdfs:label
labelProp.description: A human readable name or label for the entity, intended for developers

identified_byProp.title: crm:P1_is_identified_by
identified_byProp.description: A `Name` or `Identifier` that identifies the entity

classified_asProp.title: crm:P2_has_type
classified_asProp.description: A `Type` which classifies this entity beyond the class given in the `type` property

contentProp.title: crm:P190_has_symbolic_content
contentProp.description: The string representation of a `Name`, `Identifier`, `Statement` or other text

referred_to_byProp.title: crm:P67i_is_referred_to_by
referred_to_byProp.description: An embedded statement about this entity, or a reference to a text that refers to the entity

aboutProp.title: crm:P129_is_about
aboutProp.description: The main topic(s) of the content

languageProp.title: crm:P72_has_language
languageProp.description: A reference to one or more `Language` entities in which the `content` of this text is written

equivalentProp.title: la:equivalent
equivalentProp.description: A reference to one or more other identities for this entity, such as in external vocabularies or systems

representationProp.title: crm:P138i_has_representation
representationProp.description: An embedded link through a VisualItem to a Digital Object

member_ofSetProp.title: la:member_of
member_ofSetProp.description: A reference to one or more `Set` entities of which this entity is a member

member_ofGroupProp.title: crm:P107i_is_current_or_former_member_of
member_ofGroupProp.description: A reference to one or more `Group` entities of which this entity is a member

valueProp.title: crm:P90_has_value
valueProp.description: The numeric value of a `Dimension` or `MonetaryAmount`

upper_value_limitProp.title: crm:P90a_has_upper_value_limit
upper_value_limitProp.description: The highest possible value for the `Dimension` or `MonetaryAmount`

lower_value_limitProp.title: crm:P90a_has_lower_value_limit
lower_value_limitProp.description: The lowest possible value for the `Dimension` or `MonetaryAmount`

took_place_atProp.title: crm:P7_took_place_at
took_place_atProp.description: A `Place` at which this event occured

timespanProp.title: crm:P4_has_time-span
timespanProp.description: A `TimeSpan` which describes the date-time range during which this event occured

caused_byProp.title: sci:O13i_is_triggered_by
caused_byProp.description: Another event which caused this event to occur

carried_out_byProp.title: crm:P14_carried_out_by
carried_out_byProp.description: A reference to a Person or Group which carried out this activity

participantProp.title: crm:P11_had_participant
participantProp.description: A reference to a Person or Group which participated in this activity

techniqueProp.title: crm:P32_used_general_technique
techniqueProp.description: A general technique that was employed to carry out this activity

used_specific_objectProp.title: crm:P16_used_specific_object
used_specific_objectProp.description: An object or set of things which was used to carry out this activity

influenced_byProp.title: crm:P15_was_influenced_by
influenced_byProp.description: An entity that influenced the activity in some way

carried_outProp.title: crm:P14i_performed
carried_outProp.description: One or more activities which this entity carried out or performed

participated_inProp.title: crm:P11i_participated_in
participated_inProp.description: One or more activities which this entity participated in, but did not carry out directly

contact_pointProp.title: crm:P76_has_contact_point
contact_pointProp.description: An identifier which can be used as a contact point or address for the entity, such as an email address

residenceProp.title: crm:P74_has_current_or_former_residence
residenceProp.description: A `Place` where this entity has resided or done business

dimensionProp.title: crm:P43_has_dimension
dimensionProp.description: One or more `Dimension` structures that describe this entity

made_ofProp.title: crm:P45_consists_of
made_ofProp.description: One or more `Material` types of which this object is made

current_ownerProp.title: crm:P52_has_current_owner
current_ownerProp.description: The current owner (a `Person` or `Group`) of this object

current_custodianProp.title: crm:P50_has_current_keeper
current_custodianProp.description: The current custodian (a `Person` or `Group`) of this object, if different from its owner

current_permanent_custodianProp.title: la:current_permanent_custodian
current_permanent_custodianProp.description: The current normal custodian (a `Person` or `Group`) if different from the current custodian, for example an object that is owned by an individual, currently in an exhibition, and normally under the custody of an organization

current_locationProp.title: crm:P55_has_current_location
current_locationProp.description: The current location (a `Place`) of this object

current_permanent_locationProp.title: crm:P54_has_current_permanent_location
current_permanent_locationProp.description: The current normal location (a `Place`) of this object, if different from the current location

held_or_supported_byProp.title: crm:P198i_is_held_or_supported_by
held_or_supported_byProp.description: The physical object which holds/contains or supports this object

used_forProp.title: crm:P16i_was_used_for
used_forProp.description: Activities that this entity was used for.

showsProp.title: crm:P65_shows_visual_item
showsProp.description: A reference to a `VisualItem` that this object shows the image content of

carriesProp.title: crm:P128_carries
carriesProp.description: A reference to a `LinguisticObject` that this object carries the textual content of

subject_ofProp.title: crm:P129i_is_subject_of
subject_ofProp.description: One or more human-readable web pages or other digital objects where the focus of the content is this entity

subject_toProp.title: crm:P104i_is_subject_to
subject_toProp.description: One or more Rights that this object is subject to

attributed_byProp.title: crm:P140i_was_attributed_by
attributed_byProp.description: One or more AttributeAssignments that relate some other entity to this one

attributed_byRelProp.title: crm:P140i_was_attributed_by
attributed_byRelProp.description: One or more AttributeAssignments that relate some other entity to this one

formatProp.title: dc:format
formatProp.description: The media type of the content of the embedded text, e.g. text/plain

conforms_toProp.title: dcterms:conformsTo
conforms_toProp.description: A standard or specification that this entity conforms to or embodies

access_pointProp.title: la:access_point
access_pointProp.description: A URL from which the digital object is able to be retrieved

digitally_shown_byProp.title: la:digitally_shown_by
digitally_shown_byProp.description: A digital object that shows the current visual item

digitally_carried_byProp.title: la:digitally_carried_by
digitally_carried_byProp.description: A digital object that carries the current linguistic object

digitally_available_viaProp.title: la:digitally_available_via
digitally_available_viaProp.description: A digital service that may be interacted with in order to retrieve or act upon the digital object

conceptually_part_ofProp.title: crm:P148i_is_component_of
conceptually_part_ofProp.description: An Abstract Work that the current work is conceptually part of

members_contained_byProp.title: la:members_contained_by
members_contained_byProp.description: A physical object that this object is contained by (like a box or folder) or supported by (like a shelf)

duringProp.title: crm:P10_falls_within
duringProp.description: A reference to a Period that the current temporal entity occurs during

beforeProp.title: crm:P183_ends_before_the_start_of
beforeProp.description: A Period, Event or Activity that the current Period, Event or Activity is before. (e.g. the referenced temporal entity is after the current one)

afterProp.title: crm:P183i_starts_after_the_end_of
afterProp.description: A Period, Event or Activity that the current Period, Event or Activity is after. (e.g. the referenced temporal entity is before the current one)

Name.title: crm:E33_E41_Linguistic_Appellation
Name.description:
A name of an entity
See: [API](https://linked.art/api/1.0/shared/name/) | [Model](https://linked.art/model/base/#names)

part.description: A list of one or more `Name` structures, which are parts of this `Name`

Identifier.title: crm:E42_Identifier
Identifier.description:
An identifier for an entity
See: [API](https://linked.art/api/1.0/shared/identifier/) | [Model](https://linked.art/model/base/#identifiers)

part.description: A list of one or more `Identifier` structures, which are parts of this `Identifier`

assigned_by.description: The activity through which this `Identifier` was assigned to the entity

Statement.title: crm:E33_Linguistic_Object
Statement.description:
An embedded, relatively short piece of textual content
See: [API](https://linked.art/api/1.0/shared/statement/) | [Model](https://linked.art/model/base/#statements-about-a-resource)

TimeSpan.title: crm:E52_Time-Span
TimeSpan.description:
A data structure for recording a span of time
See: [API](https://linked.art/api/1.0/shared/timespan/) | [Model](https://linked.art/model/base/#time-span-details)

begin_of_the_begin.title: crm:P82a_begin_of_the_begin
begin_of_the_begin.description: The earliest possible date-time at which the timespan could have started

end_of_the_begin.title: crm:P81a_end_of_the_begin
end_of_the_begin.description: The latest possible date-time at which the timespan could have started

begin_of_the_end.title: crm:P81b_begin_of_the_end
begin_of_the_end.description: The earliest possible date-time at which the timespan could have ended

end_of_the_end.title: crm:P82b_end_of_the_end
end_of_the_end.description: The latest possible date-time at which the timespan could have ended

duration.title: crm:P191_had_duration
duration.description: A `Dimension` that describes the duration of the timespan within any given date-times

Dimension.title: crm:E54_Dimension
Dimension.description:
A measurable aspect of an entity, with a numeric value, a unit for that value, and a type relative to the entity
See: [API](https://linked.art/api/1.0/shared/dimension/) | [Model](https://linked.art/model/object/physical/#dimensions)

unit.title: crm:P91_has_unit
unit.description: Reference to the MeasurementUnit for this dimension

assigned_by.title: crm:P141i_was_assigned_by
assigned_by.description: The Measurement(s) that led to the assigning of this dimension

MonetaryAmount.title: crm:E97_Monetary_Amount
MonetaryAmount.description:
An amount of money, with a value and a currency
See: [API](https://linked.art/api/1.0/shared/money/) | [Model](https://linked.art/model/provenance/acquisition.html#payments)

Right.title: crm:E30_Right
Right.description: A legal right that can be held by some party over some entity

Creation.title: crm:E65_Creation
Creation.description: The creation of the intellectual/conceptual entity

part_of.title: crm:P9i_forms_part_of
part_of.description: An identified event or activity which this creation is part of

Concept.title: crm:E55_Type
Concept.description:
A concept or 'Type' in the taxonomic sense
See: [API](https://linked.art/api/1.0/shared/type/) | [Model](https://linked.art/model/base/#types-and-classifications)

Activity.title: crm:E7_Activity
Activity.description: An activity carried out by some person or group

AttributeAssignment.title: crm:E13_Attribute_Assignment
AttributeAssignment.description: An activity which involves the assignment of some value to some entity, often with an explicit relationship between value and entity

assigned.description: Attribute Assignments can assign any entity, structure or value

assigned_property.title: crm:P177_assigned_property_type
assigned_property.description: The relationship from the attributed entity to the assigned entity, given as a string which resolves to a relationship in the context definition

RelationshipAssignment.title: crm:E13_Attribute_Assignment
RelationshipAssignment.description: An activity which relates two entities together, optionally with a specific relationship

assigned.description: Attribute Assignments can assign any entity or structure

assigned_property.title: crm:P177_assigned_property_type
assigned_property.description: The relationship from the attributed entity to the assigned entity, given as a string which resolves to a relationship in the context definition

DigitalObjectEmbed.title: dig:D1_Digital_Object
DigitalObjectEmbed.description: An embedded Digital Object, such as a home page reference

VisualItemEmbed.title: crm:E36_Visual_Item
VisualItemEmbed.description: An embedded Visual Item, such as the content of a digital image

LinguisticObjectEmbed.title: crm:E33_Linguistic_Object
LinguisticObjectEmbed.description: An embedded Linguistic Object, such as the content of a web page

LingObjOrVisualItemRef.description: A Linguistic Object Reference or Visual Item Reference

LingObjOrDigitalObjOrStatement.description: A Linguistic Object Reference, Digitial Object Reference or Statement

PersonRefOrGroupRef.description: A Reference to a Person or Group

ContextStringOrArray.title: JSON-LD Context
ContextStringOrArray.description: Either an array of contexts, or a string containing the Linked Art context URI

AnyRef.description:
Reference to another primary entity
See: [API](https://linked.art/api/1.0/shared/reference/) | [Model]()

AnyTypeRef.title: crm:E55_Type, or subclass
AnyTypeRef.description: Reference to a Type or any subclass (Language, Material, Currency, MeasurementUnit)
